snippet: The solar installer says a battery system created with Tesla Motors will allow the use of stored electricity in times of highest demand, which would reduce usage at peak periods and associated fees.
abstract: Solar installer SolarCity says a battery system created with Tesla Motors will allow the use of stored electricity in times of highest demand, which would reduce usage at peak periods and associated fees.
lead_paragraph: The solar installer says a battery system created with Tesla Motors will allow the use of stored electricity in times of highest demand, which would reduce usage at peak periods and associated fees.

headline.main: SolarCity to Use Batteries From Tesla for Energy Storage
headline.print_headline: SolarCity to Use Batteries From Tesla for Energy Storage
